gpigb.store

Class InMemoryStore<DataType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gpigb.classloading.Patchable
      • gpigb.store.InMemoryStore<DataType>
  • Type Parameters:
    DataType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SensorObserver<DataType>, Store

    public class InMemoryStore<DataType>
extends Patchable
implements Store, SensorObserver<DataType>
    A record store which maintains all records in memory. This should not be used as the sole store of a system and should only be used to provide faster access when only a slow store is available
